summary: Adds a small basement with 10 Hearthfire planters to Severin Manor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]


This was a request for a small garden in Severin Manor, added by the Dragonborn DLC. It has 10 useable planters and several containers for storage, which will not respawn, so they will be safe to use. The trapdoor to access it is near the alchemy area of the house, and it is fully navmeshed.

I am not planning on making any updates, so I apologize in advance if you feel the area is too small.

Due to the nature of Skyrim and its master files, this mod requires you to have Skyrim.esm, Update.esm, Hearthfires.esm and Dragonborn.esm. Crazy, I know!

To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your "Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Have fun!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
